mapper.insert: insert into videoinfo(title, description, createuserid, videoType, imgpath,videopath, createtime, updatetime,isown) values(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{videoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isown,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from videoinfo where videoType = #{videoType} and isown = 0 ORDER BY updatetime DESC LIMIT 12
select * from videoinfo where createuserid = #{userId} ORDER BY updatetime DESC LIMIT 12
